author: bommel
msg: adding example for page width and height

author: smilek
msg: added public method initFragments() to get decorations, portlet modes and window states for a specific set of portlets (fragments argument expects a List of portlet ContentFragment objects) (needed for getactions ajaxapi); when called through ajaxapi, the current portlet mode and current window state are included in the set of DecoratorActions (for regular valve invocation, these are excluded)

author: chatra
msg: made minor corrections. Thanks Charitha for pointing them out

author: smilek
msg: added getActionType to DecoratorAction and DecoratorActionTemplate (values are state, mode and both); added getCurrentModeAction and getCurrentStateAction to BaseDecoration; added getActionName to DecoratorAction to provide access to non-localized action name
